column2: an A.M. Eatery////I've tried almost everything on the menu
column3: but I would recommend any of their pancakes
column5: or their SNOOZE BREAKFAST BURRITO. The breakfast burrito is huge
column7: add in breakfast sausage on the inside
column8: opt to get half of the green chili sauce and half of the ranchero sauce
column9: utilize some of their yellowbird Serrano hot sauce
column10: and you're set for a great morning.
